reviews.text:
Usually long queue. Closing and opening time less people. Service is ok, cashier does not know how to apply promotion.

Menu is a bit small. Got to use camera to take and enlarge.
Prices were cheap and reasonable. Had a discount on the large size which made it cheaper than the medium. Fresh juice

The boost here was not great, quality seems to be worse than other branches. I ordered my usual, skinny dip, and it tasted very different. There was too much banana, was not cold, and barely had a strawberry taste. It had an odd taste overall but still drinkable I guess. The staff here was not very attentive nor friendly when I was ordering the drink. I waited quite a while to order even though there was no one in line, but the wait for the drink was average

I love the way that there are option to either choose from the different combination already advertised or do your own. Itâ€™s a good pick incase you need something refreshing and healthy. I ordered 5 a day juice in medium size glass. BOOST yourself in true sense! Try it out!

Ordered a drink, waited for 25mins and my name is not called. Went to ask what's thr status of my drink. Juz look at my receipt and make my drink on the spot. Must be someone took my drink and noticed they didnt check receipt before letting people take drink. Not a single words been said , no apology! Avoid this store if u can, u been warned!
